title: Moving Closer: 6 Book Box Set
description: The award winning series, Women of Courage, now comes in a box set.Grace in MombasaFaith in AbertilleryCharity in CheshireHope in LiverpoolEach book is a standalone story, but all have the theme of women who find courage and the Lord.I believe all women live with courage in their hearts. This series is dedicated to all women who struggle and have to search for strength. Everyday women might not win wars, find cures to diseases or become princesses, they do however, live each day facing numerous battles. Problems the world throws at them and perhaps more importantly their inner feelings of ‘not being enough.’ This series is my tribute to the battles we all face. Take heart, be encouraged and may God walk beside you.For book descriptions and plenty of reviews, please check out the individual books.
author: T.N. Traynor
